title: Itopride
overview: Itopride Hydrochloride is a white crystalline powder, functioning as a gastroprokinetic agent with both dopamine D2 receptor antagonistic and acetylcholinesterase inhibitory activities. It enhances gastrointestinal motility and accelerates gastric emptying, making it highly effective in the treatment of functional dyspepsia and other gastrointestinal disorders. Itopride is known for its dual-action mechanism and minimal central nervous system side effects, offering improved patient compliance and therapeutic outcomes.
features: Dual mechanism: D2 receptor antagonism and acetylcholinesterase inhibition
Enhances gastric motility and alleviates symptoms of dyspepsia
Low risk of central nervous system side effects
Suitable for various oral dosage forms including tablets and capsules
Chemically stable under standard storage conditions

applications.title: Pharmaceutical
applications.description: Widely used as an active pharmaceutical ingredient in the formulation of tablets and capsules for the treatment of functional dyspepsia, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), and related gastrointestinal motility disorders
